text: @realDonaldTrump Every death from covid19 is your responsibility period Mr wartime president. More likemr warprofiteering president . You suck and people are dead and it's your fault Australia knew about this since Nov. Who warned everyone your slow response is your fault stop lies

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.
